WorkItem.Description:
Hello all,
I am just trying to read/write xlsx template with PHPExcel. After loading that class from github, histograms began to be exported (thanks to setIncludeCharts(TRUE)).
But some elements was disappeared. (f.e. Title of histogram and secondary vertical (value) axis)
There is png file in attach: top picture - its before read/write, bottom - after
Any suggestions?
Thanks.
ps sorry for russy-english (=
WorkItem.Summary: disappearing of some Histogram elements after read/write xlsx

Comments.Message: Please try with the latest github develop branch code.... a lot of problems with charts have already been resolved since the 1.7.7. release
However, secondary vertical axes are not supported, so they will be lost
thank you for information and for your work =)
